components.description:
Two hands forming a heart shape. Used to express love and support.

This emoji currently showns the heart being made through two hands being curved into a C-shape with their thumbs touching. This is stereotypically referred to as the "Millennial Hand Heart".
components.title: Heart Hands

title: Heart Hands

version.description:
Unicode 14.0 is the version of the Unicode Standard released on September 14, 2021. 37 new emoji code points were added in this release, with all 112 new emojis (including sequences for skin tones) listed under Emoji 14.0.

New emojis added in this release are update expected to come to major platforms in either late 2021 or early 2022.

This release of this Unicode Standard was delayed from March 2021 due to COVID-19. 

  • üìù Unicode 14.0 details on Unicode.org

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the heart hands emoji is a masterclass in elegant simplicity, depicting two hands coming together to form a perfect, glowing red heart. Apple‚Äôs signature 3D rendering gives the hands a tactile, realistic quality with smooth, rounded fingers and subtle shading that suggests soft skin. The heart itself is rendered with a brilliant, glossy finish and precise lighting, making it pop with emotion. This emoji on Apple devices is a universal symbol of love, care, and support, conveying empathy and heartfelt connection in digital conversations.
